text_logic_form: The line segment $VT$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $VUT$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $VUT$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line segment $VT$ is the hypotenuse of triangle $VUT$.
Find the length of the altitude of triangle $VUT$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line segment $VW$ is $2$ units.
The length of the line segment $TV$ is $13$ units.
Point $W$ lies on the line connecting $T$ and $V$.
The line segment $TW$ is perpendicular to the line segment $UW$.
The line segment $UW$ is perpendicular to the line segment $TU$.
line_instances: There are lines $VW$, $TV$, and $UV$, forming triangle $VUT$.
The line segment $TW$ is the altitude of triangle $VUT$.
